content.description: POPULATION DATA BY COUNTRY LEVEL OF DEVELOPMENT, 2018
content.question: Birth Rateper 1,000 Population Death Rateper 1,000 Population Total Fertility Rate Core Countries 10 10 1.6 Semiperiphery Countries 21 7 2.6 Periphery Countries 33 8 4.2 Source: Population Reference Bureau Based on the data shown in the table, which of the following accurately describes changes in the roles of women as countries develop economically?

choices.label: More women work in professional jobs
Fewer women enroll in secondary school
Most women work in the home

content.answer: More women work in professional jobs

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe spatial patterns presented in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data.
